measurements_data.comments: The National Solid Waste Management Strategy plan covers only 77.5 percent of Azerbaijan, excluding occupied territory (20 percent) and Greater Baku Area (2.5 percent). The total amount generated in these areas is 964,427 tonnes/year; value is calculated from the amout generated in these areas (964,427 tonnes/year) and in the Baku area (1,965,922 tonnes/year)
